channel.title: rafekettler.com
channel.description: My thoughts on programming and technology

item.title: A Truly Great Python Fail
item.content:encoded:
I saw this on Stack Overflow, and I almost soiled myself with how funny it is. Without any further adieu, here's the snippet:

def my_func(name=None):
    if name isn't None:
        # do something

If The Daily WTF took Python code (it has almost never appeared on TDWTF), this would definitely make it, even though it's a simple mistake. Too classic.

item.title: Awesome Computer Science Band Name Ideas
item.description: Awesome Computer Science Band Name Ideas
item.content:encoded:
For a bit of fun, I've come up with a few CS-term-based band names(some of these may be taken):

  • Reverse Polish notation
  • Brainfuck
  • The Regular Expressions
  • Map-Reduce
  • The Generators (or the Iterators)
  • Reduced Instruction Set Funk
  • C# and F#
  • Big-Endian
  • Tux

Nerd points if you know what all this is talking about. Did I miss something? Leave a comment.
